Goal Representation:
behavior fill_cup_with_water(faucet:item, cup:item):
    # Behavior to fill a cup with water from a faucet
    body:
        achieve close(faucet, cup) # Ensure the cup is near the faucet
        achieve has_water(cup) # Fill the cup with water

behavior __goal__():

            is_cup(cup)

behavior is_water_filled(faucet:item, cup:item):
    # Behavior to fill a cup with water from a faucet
    body:
        achieve close(faucet, cup) # Ensure the cup is near the faucet
        achieve has_water(cup) # Fill the cup with water
